title: Getting started with Checkmk
description: Checkmk is very powerful. To make it easier for you to get started, this Onboarding Guide will take you step by step through various topics that are particularly important at the beginning.

articles.title: Add hosts to your monitoring
articles.description: Adding hosts in Checkmk is a fundamental step to monitor and manage your infrastructure effectively. Here you will find topics to guide you through the process of adding hosts to your monitoring.

articles.title: Network Device Monitoring and Monitoring via SNMP
Define responsibility and visibility for a host
Define notifications based on host criticality
Configure services
articles.description: Services are the actual 'substance' of a monitoring system. Each one summarizes one or more aspects of a host, representing an important cog in your complex IT landscape. Here you will find topics on how you can adapt services to your needs.

articles.title: Configure check parameters for a service
Setup notifications
articles.description: Setting up notifications in Checkmk is crucial for timely awareness of critical events in your IT infrastructure. Notifications ensure that relevant stakeholders are informed when issues occur, allowing for prompt response and resolution.

articles.title: Configure dashboards and views
articles.description: Creating a custom dashboard in Checkmk enables you to tailor your monitoring interface to specific needs and preferences. Here you will find topics to guide you through the process of configuring dashboards and views.
